headline: Jim Cramer Says Alaska Air is Good “But as a Trading Vehicle Only”
summary: Alaska Air Group, Inc. (NYSE:ALK) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently commented on. During the lightning round, a caller inquired about the stock, and here’s what Mad Money’s host had to say in response: “Yeah, I think Alaska’s good, I think, but as a trading vehicle only. You want to buy it… [as] […]
